wiki.summary: “Happy” contains 6 songs and a duration of 16 minutes and 50 seconds. The EP is the debut solo EP by South Korean singer Jin (member of the boy band BTS). Released on November 15, 2024 through Big Hit Music. This track is a collaboration with the South Korean singer WENDY (member of the group Red Velvet) on the fifth track «Heart on the Window» performed by Jin & Wendy. Preceded by the single «I'll Be There» which was released on October 25, 2024 Jin of BTS solo projects Read more on Last.fm.
